thread.title: MusicNews | A lot of people are saying that this guy's viral cover of 'Shake It Off' is better than the original
thread.title_full: MusicNews | A lot of people are saying that this guy's viral cover of 'Shake It Off' is better than the original - entertainment.ie

author: Lauren Murphy
title: MusicNews | A lot of people are saying that this guy's viral cover of 'Shake It Off' is better than the original
text:
A performance of Taylor Swift's 'Shake It Off' was captured on camera at the weekend, and many people are claiming that it's better than the original.
No, it's not by Ryan Adams - but it appears that the pop star's hit has the ability to cross genres, as guitarist Joel Cross discovered.
Cross gave the song a smooth soul-pop vibe on amplified acoustic guitar when playing at the Botanical Gardens in Dallas, Texas at the weekend, and the resulting video has been viewed over half a million times in the last two days.
Watch it below and decide for yourself - better or worse than Swift's own version?
In related news, Swift and Ryan Adams have made US chart history by being the first artists to share an identical album in the Top 10, with ' 1989'.
MORE: Watch: Taylor Swift got to 'Shake It Off' with 7-year-old Dylan from 'Ellen'. Results = amazing
MORE: Watch: The Rock sang 'Shake It Off' in this week's episode of Ballers
MORE: MTV spokesperson releases (hilarious) statement regarding Taylor Swift's alleged on air VMA 'fart'
